#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define ll long long int
#define mp make_pair
#define f first
#define s second
int main()
{
	vector < pair<ll,ll> > v;
	long long int n,m,i,a,b,p,count=0;
	scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&n,&m,&p);
		while(p--)
		{
			scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
			v.pb(mp(m-b+a-1,a));
		}
	sort(v.begin(),v.end());
	ll sz=v.size(),cm,ci;
	cm=-1;
	ci=-1;
	ll multi=0;
	for(i=0;i<sz;i++)
	{
			if((v[i].f==cm&&v[i].s==ci)||(i==0))
			{
				multi++;
			}
			else
			{
				count=count^((cm%2)*multi);
				multi=1;
			}
			cm=v[i].f;
			ci=v[i].s;
		
	}
	count=count^((cm%2)*multi);
	if(count==0)
	printf("No\n");
	else
	printf("Yes\n");
	return 0;
}
